name: Runesword
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Runesword. If a creature dealt damage by the targeted creature would die this turn, exile that creature instead.

name: War Elephant
printed_name: ウォー・エレファント
oracle_text: Trample; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
